meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Debra Newman Gonzalo Rufatt Kris Hamilton Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6508.

td.p: Debra Newman, a psychologist from Pound Ridge, New York
Gonzalo Rufatt, a financial advisor from Santa Fe, New Mexico
Kris Hamilton, a computer technician from Dublin, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $37,001)

tr.td: A BUNCH OF IDIOMS
MEDICAL EQUIPMENT
(Alex: That was a good year.)
RESTAURANTS BY SLOGAN
TALK OF THE TOWN
THEIR SOLE OSCAR NOMINATION
